lead_paragraph: Tensions at a prison in Hama were so high on Monday night that prisoners feared that government forces would try to storm the compound by morning.

headline.print_headline: Inmates in Syrian Prison Fear Reprisal After Revolt
headline.main: Inmates in Syrian Prison Fear Reprisal After Revolt

snippet: Tensions at a prison in Hama were so high on Monday night that prisoners feared that government forces would try to storm the compound by morning.
abstract: Leaders of prison revolt in Hama, Syria, lack food and medicine and fear reprisals from government forces massed outside; outrage over improper detentions, torture and conditions within prisons prompted uprising.
